EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at OSCON 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at OSCON. We hope you enjoyed all the amazing talks on topics like serverless, Kubernetes, Istio, continuous delivery, and more. How can you use this modern tech to achieve real business outcomes for your customers? If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a daylong hands-on workshop in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-oscon-portland-q318]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, start your cloud-native journey <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-oscon-portland-q318]]> and learn about underlying concepts <[[https://pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-oscon-portland-q318]]>, why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud-native. Download and read free chapters of Thinking Architecturally <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/thinking-architecturally?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-oscon-portland-q318]]>, by Nathaniel Schutta.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Building your own cryptocurrency <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-or/public/schedule/detail/67766]]> - Reactive Spring <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-or/public/schedule/detail/66922]]> - On-demand Kubernetes cluster management with BOSH and PKS <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-or/public/schedule/detail/70963]]> - Concourse: Cloud-scale continuous delivery <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/oscon/oscon-or/public/schedule/detail/67442]]>
Click here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/oscon?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-oscon-portland-q318]]> for the latest in Pivotal and Open Source Software.
Stay in touch with the Pivotal Team and join the conversation on our blogs <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-oscon-portland-q318]]>, podcasts <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-oscon-portland-q318]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalDACH]]>. We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-oscon-portland-q318]]>!
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
P.S. It's time to level-up. Join your peers at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-oscon-portland-q318]]> and pick up new skills and ideas to build better software, faster. Use the discount code Attendee_Event_100 to get $100 off the posted price.
